text: Rango is a 2011 American computer-animated western comedy film directed by Gore Verbinski and produced by Verbinski, Graham King and John B. Carls. The film was released on March 4, 2011. It was positively received from the audience. It won the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature. == Cast == *Johnny Depp as Rango, a chameleon *Isla Fisher as Beans, a desert iguana *James Ward Bykrit as Waffles, a horned lizard *Abigail Breslin as Priscilla, a cactus mouse *Alfred Molina as Roadkill, a nine-banded armadillo *Bill Nighy as Rattlesnake Jake, a western diamondback rattlesnake *Harry Dean Stanton as Balthazar, a mole *Maile Flanagan as Lucky *Ray Winstone as Bad Bill, a Gila monster *Ned Beatty as John, a desert tortoise *Timothy Olyphant as The Spirit of the West *Alanna Ubach as Fresca *Lew Temple as Furgus *Ian Abercrombie as Ambrose *Stephen Root as Doc and Merrimack *John Cothran, Jr. as Elgin *Beth Grant as Bonnie *Gil Birmingham as Wounded Bird *Blake Clark as Buford *Joe Nunez as Rockeye *Daisy Eckersley as Melonee *Alex Manugian as Spoons *Logan Grove as Mouse Boy #1 *Kwesi Boakye as Mouse Boy #2 *Kyla Rae Kowalewski as Mouse Girl == Other websites == *Rango's Official website * Category:2011 action movies Category:2011 comedy movies Category:2011 animated movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Computer-animated movies Category:English-language movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:Movies that won the Best Animated Feature Academy Award Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies directed by Gore Verbinski
title: Rango (2011 movie)
